description:
Data and code for research article Reproducible Research and GIScience: an evaluation using GIScience conference papers.

This record is a preservation of the collaborative project at https://github.com/nuest/reproducible-research-at-giscience/. A preprint is publised on EarthArXiv at https://doi.org/10.31223/X5ZK5V.
